resources.string: New in 6.0.0\n * Modernisation to Android 5.0 bringing lots of new UI goodies.\n * Cover thumbnails and log files moved to dedicated sub folders.\n * Configurable websites search order.\n * New Search website: ISFDB.\n * Better Anthology support (Edit/View/cross-book) and morphed into \'Table of Content\' or \'TOC\'\n * TOC auto populated (ISFDB site only!).\n * Language field wil show the translated name for the current locale.\n * Books & Anthology/TOC titles now have a \'first published\' field.\n * Books Editions (1st, book-club, etc).\n * Book paid price.\n * Book date acquired.\n * Currency support for prices.\n * Styles now exported/imported in XML format.\n * Export of all tables can also be done in XML (no import yet).\n * LibraryThing & ISFDB local id for future usage.\n * Database upgrades only supported from the earliest version 4.0.0.\n * Removed the old \'Classic\' view (sorry).\n
New in 5.2.2\n * Bug fixes\n
New in 5.2.0\n * User-selectable locale in Preferences\n * Greek translation (Dimitris Klisiaris)\n * Locale-specific capitalization (de, fr)\n * Improvements to search\n * Bug fixes\n
New in 5.1.1\n * Bug fixes\n * New style: Group by last update date\n * New style: Group by rating\n * New style: Group by bookshelf name\n

New in 5.1.0\n * Italian translation (Eugenio Davolio)\n * Spanish translation (José M. Galdo)\n * Turkish translations (Emir Sarı)\n * Ability to archive only new/updated books and to exclude covers (or books)\n * Better thumbnail size in lists for high density screens\n * Added options to see books by author/series at Amazon\n * Other minor bug fixes\n
New in 5.0.9\n * Bug fix for Android 4.4 (KitKat)\n * Dutch translation (Gideon van Melle)\n * Other minor bug fixes\n
New in 5.0.8\n * German translation updates (Robert Wetzlmayr)\n
New in 5.0.5\n * "Added Date" List now sorted in reverse order \n * French translation updates (Imkal)\n * Bug fixes\n
New in 5.0.4\n * New field: Language\n * French translation updates (Imkal)\n * Bug fixes\n
New in 5.0.3\n * Bug fixes\n * French translation updates (Imkal)\n
New in 5.0.2\n * Bug fixes\n

New in 5.0.0\n * A non-editable view of book details, with \'fling\' support! (See \"Other Preferences\") (Nick Silin)\n * Archiving (Backup & Import) of entire catalogue, including books, covers, preferences and styles\n * Updated interface with Action Bar support for usability and to work better on devices without menu buttons\n * Support for pic2shop scanner (better for fixed focus, low light and in front-facing cameras)\n * Goodreads now appears in main menu if you authorize it\n * Check internet connection earlier when trying to scan books\n * More German translation updates (Robert Wetzlmayr)\n * More French translation updates (Imkal & Djiko)\n * More Russian translation updates (Nick Silin)\n * Internal changes in anticipation of an improved tablet interface\n * Bug fixes\n

New in 4.2.4\n * A non-editable view of book details, with \'fling\' support! (See \"Other Preferences\") (Nick Silin)\n * Support for pic2shop scanner (better for fixed focus, low light and in front-facing cameras)\n * Check internet connection earlier when trying to scan books\n * More German translation updates (Robert Wetzlmayr)\n * More French translation updates (Djiko)\n * Bug fixes\n
New in 4.2.3\n * Improve handling of invalid ISBNs when sending to Goodreads\n * Other minor bug fixes\n

New in 4.2.2\n * Fix tiling of background image for some Android versions\n * Better handling of incompatible scanner apps\n * Send more details on crash or when asking for help\n * Cleanup of layouts (Nick Silin)\n * Bug fixes\n
New in 4.2.1\n * Fix crash when expanding list items and using \'Expand All\'\n

New in 4.2\n * Date-Picker that supports dates down to 0AD as well as partial dates\n * HTML descriptions display correctly with click to edit\n * Preference for pre-selecting whole image when cropping\n * Preference for auto-rotating images from camera\n * Preference to use external cropping tool (experimental)\n * Added more items to the options menus\n * French translation updates (Imkal)\n * German translation updates (Robert Wetzlmayr)\n * Russian translation updates (Nick Silin)\n * Updated OK/Cancel button positions to conform to current Android standards\n * Full keyboard available when entering ASINs\n * Keeps 5 previous export files\n * Better detection of \'changes\' when editing books\n * Support for a wider range of Gallery and file browsers\n * More reliable date handling on import/export/sync\n * Fix handling of duplicate anthology titles\n * Various bugs fixed\n Many thanks to our dedicated beta testers and translators!\n Blame Grunthos for all bugs and errors. And send us bug reports.\n

New in 4.1\n * New style groups: Location and Date Read\n * Improved \'Share\' functionality (filipeximenes)\n * French translation updates (Djiko)\n * Better handling of the 'back' key when editing books (filipeximenes)\n * Various bug fixes\n

New in 4.0.6\n * When adding books, scanning or typing an existing ISBN allows you the option to edit the book.\n * Allow ASINs to be entered manually as well as ISBNs\n * German translation updates (Robert Wetzlmayr)\n
New in 4.0.4\n * Search now searches series and anthology data\n * Allows non-numeric data entry in series position\n * Better sorting of leading numerical in series position\n * Several bug fixes\n

New in 4.0.3\n * ISBN validation when searching/scanning and error beep when scanning (with preference to turn it off)\n * \'Loaned\' list now shows available books under the heading \'Available\'\n * Added preference to hide list headers (for small phones)\n * Restored functionality to use current bookshelf when adding book\n * FastScroller sizing improved\n * Several bugs fixed\n
New in 4.0.1\n * Added a preference to completely disable background bitmap\n * Added book counts to book lists\n

New in 4.0\n Updates courtesy of (mainly) Philip Warner (a.k.a Grunthos) — blame him, politely, if it toasts your data\n * New look, new startup page\n * Synchronization with goodreads (www.goodreads.com)\n * New styles for book lists (including \'Compact\' and \'Unread\')\n * User-defined styles for book lists\n * More efficient memory usage\n * New preferences, including \'always expanded/collapsed\' lists\n * Faster expand/collapse with large collections\n * Cached covers for faster scrolling lists\n * Cover images now have globally unique names, and books have globally unique IDs, so sharing and combining collections is easier\n * Improved detection of series names\n
